title: Bloodthirster (Vote)
body:
Going over ADC builds made me think about this item. Only one ADC builds it semi-regularly. Draven. Sometimes you'll see it on MF or Cait on their 5th or 6th item, but not likely.
No champs build it regularly now. 
Maybe it is time to change Bloodthirster......?

replies.body: Remember the old Bloodthirster that stacked Damage and Lifesteal, Petridge farm remembers.
